name: The legend of the new king
name_original: The legend of the new king
description:
A puzzl adventure where you can only use your powerups 3 times per screen. Push boxes to fill holes or fight enemies to proceed to the next area.

Move: A W S D or arrow keys

Jump: Y or J

Sword attack: X or K

Tell me if you dont know how to proceed at any point

Music by: a9Tails https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCf2FBIuNxL1Bt1U-LhXi7KA
